key.summary: if true, main menu is more anxious to close

key.name: file-class
key.summary: determines which types of files to display in the file area
key.description: possible values = 0 [Applications], 1 [Documents], 2 [Places]

key.name: file-mgr-open-cmd
key.summary: This is the command to execute when the "Open in File Manager" menu item is activated.
key.description: This is the command to execute when the "Open in File Manager" menu item is activated. FILE_URI is replaced with a uri corresponding to the dirname of the activated file.

key.name: file-send-to-cmd
key.summary: This is the command to execute when the "Send To..." menu item is activated.
key.description: This is the command to execute when the "Send To..." menu item is activated. DIRNAME and BASENAME are replaced with the corresponding components of the activated tile.

key.name: max-total-items
key.summary: determines the limit of items in the file-area.
key.description: determines the limit of items in the file-area. The number of favorite items is not limited. This limit applies to the number of recent items, i.e. the number of recent items displayed is limited to max_total_items - the number of favorite items. If the number of favorite items exceeds max_total_items - min_recent_items then this limit is ignored.

key.name: min-recent-items
key.summary: determines the minimum number of items in the "recent" section of the file-area.
key.description: determines the minimum number of items in the "recent" section of the file-area.

key.name: file-blacklist
key.summary: contains the list of files (including .desktop files) to be excluded from the "Recently Used Applications" and "Recent Files" lists
key.description: contains the list of files (including .desktop files) to be excluded from the "Recently Used Applications" and "Recent Files" lists
